Lindsey Vonn is an American World Cup alpine ski racer on the US Ski Team. She has won four World Cup overall championships—one of only two female skiers to do so, along with Annemarie Moser-Pröll—with three consecutive titles in 2008, 2009, and 2010, plus another in 2012.
Mikaela Shiffrin is an American World Cup alpine ski racer. She is the reigning overall World Cup champion and an Olympic gold medalist.
